Smart keyboard: A keyboard that learns your typing habits and adapts to your preferences, improving your typing speed and accuracy.
Virtual keyboard: A virtual keyboard that projects a full-sized keyboard onto any surface, allowing you to type on any flat surface without the need for a physical keyboard.
Ergonomic keyboard: A keyboard designed to reduce strain and discomfort during typing, with adjustable height, angle, and curvature to fit the natural position of your hands and wrists.
Haptic feedback keyboard: A keyboard that provides tactile feedback through vibrations, pressure, and texture to enhance your typing experience and help you type more accurately.
Brain-computer keyboard: A keyboard that uses brain-computer interfaces (BCIs) to read your brain signals and translate them into keyboard input, allowing you to type with your mind.
